section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There are two different valuations for JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go. One valuation is $60,000 and the other is $3,500,000. This shows an inconsistency with the capital contributions.

section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: The purpose of the venture is ambigious as it will be determined by the managers. However, in Formation section of the document, the venture is entered into agreement and mutual benefit which sets the terms for the company. So this should not be ambiguous.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This introduces ambiguity and potential unfairness. The statement "A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members" lacks specific criteria or guidelines, creating the risk of undervaluation. This could be perceived as a conflict of interest and discourage members from joining or remaining in the venture.
